00003 /*
00004  * This function gives each model a chance to initialize global memory
00005  * prior to the simulation execution.
00006  *
00007  * At this point, ROSS is still only a single
00008  * thread, and rn has called tw_init, so that the LPs, KPs, PEs exist and
00009  * are mapped.  Also, the xml file(s) have been read and the RN main data
00010  * structures have been created.
00011  */
00012 void
00013 rn_models_init(rn_lptype * types, int argc, char ** argv, char ** env)
00014 {
00015         rn_lptype       *t;
00016 
00017         int              i;
00018 
00019         for(t = types, i = 0; t && t->init; t = &types[++i])
00020                 if(*t->md_init)
00021                         (*t->md_init) (argc, argv, env);
00022 }
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * This function gives each model a chance to complete operations after 
00026  * the simulation has completed.
00027  */
00028 void
00029 rn_models_final(rn_lptype * types)
00030 {
00031         rn_lptype       *t;
00032         int              i;
00033 
00034         for(t = types, i = 0; t && t->init; t = &types[++i])
00035                 if(*t->md_final)
00036                         (*t->md_final) ();
00037 }
